title: Shared infrastructure for community groups
text: Stop re‑inventing the wheel. Join Electron Workshop's network and use our maintained stack for newsletters, documents, and analytics.

title: auIGF 2025
text: Australia's Internet Governance Forum in Adelaide | 23–24 Sept 2025 (hybrid).

title: Software Freedom Day
text: Celebrate open-source and digital freedom | Saturday, 20th Sept 2025.

title: PyCon AU 2025
text: PyCon AU is the national conference for developers using the Python Programming Language. Hosted annually since 2010, this event brings the national and international Python community together.

Electron Workshop is a team effort, we actively look for new ideas, ways to connect to other organisations and help in running current activities. 

Stay tuned and reach out if we could help or if you have an offer for the group.
